has_processing_errors.title: Has Processing Errors
has_processing_errors.description: Boolean flag indicating whether any errors occurred during directory preparation. Used as a decision point for workflow branching.

working_directory_path.title: Working Directory Path
working_directory_path.description: Absolute path to the created working directory where artifacts will be stored.

exception_messages.title: Exception Messages
exception_messages.description: Array of error messages describing what failed (only present when has_processing_errors is true).
